website_summaries.verdict: Easy to use. Great for those who want to move media from an iPhone to another device.
pros: Highly convenient because you can view movies and listen to music from USB
cons: This device will copy photos, but it won't move them
in other words, it won't delete the originals

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone photo transfer device
customer_reviews.text: It solved my iPhone photo storage issue. Before using it, I tried my old Apple computer. It crashed multiple times due to more than 13K photos. I used a PC and it failed with large files. I am impressed by it's metal look. It looked great. After downloading iDiskk pro and connecting it to my iPhone, the photo transfers was very fast. You just need to full charge your phone before doing it. I am able to select different folders for transferring photos. I did read the user manu to turn off iCloud upload setting before doing so.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Best money I’ve spent in a while.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome. I’m lucky to get an electrical device turned on and I was able to figure out almost immediately how to quickly and easily transfer photos directly from my iPhone to the usb. And I was able to easily set up different folders on the usb for certain photos. Like “family” “work” “outdoors” etc etc. now anytime I take new pictures I simply plug it in and within 60 seconds my newest photos are backed up on the usb in their appropriate folder. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: The company IS behind their product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what happened to my iDiskk but what I do know is that they stand behind their product. I was sent a new device and it is working perfectly. So I am changing my rating because of the company's exceptional support and the new device. Original Review... My iDisk been perfect until the last couple of months. I no longer can transfer videos and now I have a backlog on my cell phone. If someone can tell me what to do to make it so the videos work again I will give it 5 stars. The needs that I bought it for we’re great for awhile, I need to go back to how it used to be. Help!
customer_reviews.author: K. Funk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Deserves 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! I compared many products and bought this after comparing many similar flash drives. But I can confirm this product works great with my iPhone, I didn’t face any problems like some people wrote. It’s very easy to connect to the app and then use it after that. Very handy for transferring files between my laptop and phone. It has good build quality and Looks cool too. Overall really good product. If you are looking for something similar, go for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth

customer_reviews.title: Charge your phone to full before using this
customer_reviews.text: Just to be safe, charge your phone fully before inserting this. What I did was just take it out of packaging, opened the box. I downloaded a QR code scanner to scan the QR code on the manual, which directed me to the app page for “ iDiskk pro”. Downloaded and installed the app and I plugged the usb to my phone. It asked for permissions. I clicked the phone logo on the bottom. And i clicked type then all and I saw the % going by really slowly. It must have taken an hour for my 100gb worth of pics and videos that I’m probably gonna not look at anyway. I just like to hoard.
customer_reviews.author: Heyijustmetyou

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device and more convenient with transferring Photo's and video's from my Macbook to iPhone and vice versa. After 9 months continual usage I did encounter an issue with the lightning connection to my iPhone, in so far it didn't work. I wrote to iDiskk via email and they responded almost immediately offering a full refund on my original purchase. Now that's great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why wasn't this invented years ago?
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome. I got so frustrated carrying around a heavy camera when my iphone takes just as good quality. I can just save the images and print right from the flash drive. It also saves movies and powerpoint presentations that I created with slides app. No need to carry around clunky projectors and computers.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Defective product buyer beware! You will lose tour videos!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! This item broke within hours! I started downloading my home Videos of my babies from my over-full iPhone and deleted the videos immediately To free up space. I know I should’ve backed up but I literally had no space on my iPhone. The usb stopped being recognized by my phone, won’t shop up on my laptop or iPad. 30 home movies GONE now because of this defective piece Of trash! Amazon was AMAZING however and I got a full refund but my heart is broken over losing those videos. UTTER TRASH!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Carlberg

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to download your pictures from your phone to free up space to take more pics. I hated the notification that popped up saying I had ran out of storage. This eliminates that and gives you some time until you can get to a laptop. This was the second portable usb disk that I purchased. This one was far superior to the first one I bought from a retail store. I highly recommend this product- lightning fast and holds a lot of photos and videos. Small and handy. Worth it to have on vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mother of three

customer_reviews.title: BEST 2-1 iPhone and Flashdrive 128gbs
customer_reviews.text: It easy to used and simple it good quality it won’t break that easy 💪🏽💪🏽 I used it to record my workout video when I am bodybuilding and strongman training to upload in YouTube, instrgram and other platforms ; when you record it has it own camera to high improve your Camera 👀 it goes up to 4K all the way down to 480p honest it the best 2-1 drive you will have 😃👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Darknessxmo

customer_reviews.title: there is no "Zero starrs" option
customer_reviews.text: How about this,...does not work at all? I am no IT person but I can assure you not a single time in 20 years has an IT person "fixed" an issue I had trouble with. Meaning everytime I found a problem with a computer or other device after hours of talking to the folks from New Dehli the solution was to return the defective product. This expensive product does not work with my iPhone X or any of the other iphone/ipad products we have. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Surrealius

customer_reviews.title: A less this iDiskk work
customer_reviews.text: I trying the new iDiskk 128 GB my iPhone XS and after I install the app when I plugging the usb on the app poops out no memory is connected 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Jogdy

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my iPhone. I can add documents, books, music without taking up data on the phone itself. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Do s not work with videos
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this expressly to be able to save iPhone videos of my grandbaby. It will only load a small percentage of those videos. Seller says it’s a software bug. But no fix has been supplied
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Holmin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on iPhone 6 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the App, followed the instructions exactly. Inserted flash drive to lighting port, allowed access to the phone, selected all photos, hit copy, paste and it said processing and quickly flipped back to home screen on phone. Nothing copied to the flash drive. I tried several times and it repeated the same process. Returned for refund. I ended up just downloading all of my pictures from iCloud to a local folder.
customer_reviews.author: Geraine D. Blackford

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: I must not have read the description of what this flash drive would be able to do, but the only thing you can transfer is pictures. I have other things I want to remove from my phone, but unfortunately, I have to back it up using iTunes.
customer_reviews.author: An Avid Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with phone
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything to down load photo's to this flash drive from my phone and nothing worked. Customer service is poor, this drive was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hinman

customer_reviews.title: WTF
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions as far as the request to type in my helpdesk URL. WHAT is that??? I tried to figure out what I missed in the instructions with no answer. How come am supposed to know my helpdesk URL, or any URL for that matter. Nothing in the manual or instructions. Am I frustrated....
customer_reviews.author: Herebrooks

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that works!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Finally found one that works! Have been searching for a way to store my movies to watch on my iPad as it is only 16gb. I’ve bought and returned several that just didn’t work for one reason or another. This one’s the charm! Works great as a regular thumb drive with the usb and with the iDiskk app for my iOS devices. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not otter box defender friendly
customer_reviews.text: The product does what it’s supposed to do. I didn’t use tech support so I didn’t want to give a super good or bad review. Lastly the one problem I did have was I could not use the product with my phone in it’s otter box defender case, which means that I probably won’t be using it a lot but I will on occasions, like when my camera roll gets full.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

customer_reviews.title: I think the app is the issue
customer_reviews.text: At first when I used this on my Ipad about eight months ago it worked great. But then it started shutting down after about two months of usage and I would constantly have to close the app and start it all over again. If they would just update the app and try to work out the bugs it would probably work better. For the hefty price, you're better off looking elsewhere. Very disappointed in this company for waiting three to six months to update the app. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: Parkwaypro on Youtube

customer_reviews.title: Glitches too much
customer_reviews.text: Flash drive glitches a lot when transferring data from iPhone to iDiskk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best there is
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact I can put movies I own on a computer, transfer them to this iDiskk and then watch them on my iPad away from home. I have discovered iDiskk is the best and easy to work with. What I don't like is that you cannot fill up the iDiskk. The 256 gb needs to have about 70 gb free to work correctly. So if you load too many movies it will freeze when you try to play them. I was able to put 52 movies on the 256 go and 39 on the 128 gb. Which is still a whole lot. So I am still purchasing these as they are the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I just received my USB today to save my pictures off my mini-iPad to free up some room. One free APP and you are ready to go. It was easy and I feel so much better knowing that it is backed up to my folders. I used one side to export pictures from my PC and put it into my mini iPad and was able to view all the pictures. Like having another drive to save pictures on. Holds thousands of pictures and all are able to be exported to a PC or Apple iPhone/IPad. Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sala

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: This drive is nothing of what I thought it would be. It said it was a photo storage for the iPhone. It said it was simple to just plug into your phone and it would transfer your photos to the stick. It did not work that way. After setting it up on the iPhone, I then had to manually transfer each picture!! Not at all what it advertised. This was for a 78 year old friend and I was helping her. Well even for me at 59, it was too difficult. We order her a different product.The new product you simply plugged into the phone and it transferred the photos automatically. Highly unsatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: It’s Just what I wanted! It Worked great! And quickly. I wanted something to take photos off my phone (I have an IPhone X ) and transfer them to my PC easily. All you do is plug this into your phone, and it will say you need the app. It takes you to the App Store to download it. Then it will pull up your phone pictures, videos, etc. and you backup what you want. I clicked back up everything. And it backed up over 8,000 photos in like 35 minutes. Then I plugged it into my Pc and easily transferred them onto that. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mich

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at per the instructions. Will download entire library but am unable to download selected files. Doesn’t play gifs when viewing from the drive. Can’t deket images directly off the drive either. Pretty useless. Will be returning and buying another brand for my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Will not connect to iPhone 8 or X, waste of $
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded the app, allowed it accesses, plugged it into the drive - nothing. All it says is ‘iDissk is not connected’, but it is. No wonder its ratings are so low on the iOS App Store. also the unit is so wide around the lightning connector that you have to remove your case in order to plug it in. Save your money, buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: M. Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a total of (7) of this item. The app, iDiskk Pro, on my Apple devices are easy to use. I use it mostly to view videos and photos on my iPhone and iPad. I gave several to friends. I have 2 SanDisk ixpands but I prefer the iDiskk app. My personal opinion, it is much easier to use. I'm not a tech person. Two of the iDiskk drives came with scratches on the surface. It was obvious but the drives worked fine so I did not return it. Therefore I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Wu

customer_reviews.title: Defective- not given a refund
customer_reviews.text: This item copied half of my files from my iPad Pro and then froze. I tried to format it to return but it would not allow me to do so. I called Amazon and asked them to give me a credit because I couldn’t send the item back with my personal information on it. They refused. I can’t send it back and I should not be charged for a defective item. I was on the phone for over an hour trying to resolve this issue and got nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: Barbaral7722

customer_reviews.title: Remove your case in order for devise to fit
customer_reviews.text: The devise is not compatible with my iPhone X. It does not fit my iPad Pro either. Revised review- please tell customers to remove iPhone/iPad case in order for devise to fit. This would have saved me the hassle of returning a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: susan ross

customer_reviews.title: A simple plug and play device!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been using another product ( with 256G capacity) to move photo files from my Windows computers to my iPhone and iPad. However, the other product was constantly "arranging your files so you don't have to" for 20 plus minutes before actually opening the files on my iPhone or iPad. I bought the 256G iDiskk Pro and found it instantly opens my files when plugged into my iPhone or iPad. In other words, it works immediately. All I had to do was download the app.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Lane

customer_reviews.title: The app works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased five or six units like these in the past for saving videos and photos on my phone, but the software never worked very well. The app required to run this on the phone is rock solid, and it works perfectly in both my Mac and PC laptops. I bought two and plan on buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: WHW

customer_reviews.title: Only looks good on paper
customer_reviews.text: This product has good credential on Amazon and looks professionally made. After wasting money on one of those flashy looking Chinese made junk I spent MORE money to get this one. Alas. After a few weeks of not-so-frequent use it began to having contact problem. I have to jiggle, push, re-inserting to get it connect with my Mac laptop and iMac. I am worried if I keep doing this it will ruin the USB port of my computers. Its problem is the USB side, I think. Another Chinese made junk.
customer_reviews.author: Indrajit G

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The directions (which are poorly written) are useless. They don’t match what is displayed on my iPad. You have to download an app to work with the disk, and the app doesn’t work (nearly all the recent reviews are 1 star). It will back up photos (although it doesn’t copy them into sub folders) but it doesn’t recognize other kinds of files and doesn’t allow you to copy or move them onto the flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: Livin' the Dream

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto!
customer_reviews.text: I've got an old iPhone 6s with only 12 GB of storage. With music and apps, I always run with about 2 gigs of storage left. Pics and videos (esp. videos) can take up lots of space. The iDiskk solved that problem on my recent trip from SoCal to central Wyoming. I took tons of pics. Each night, I'd move that day's pics/videos onto the iDiskk, keeping 2 gig free for the next day's pics.
customer_reviews.author: S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: ok so far
customer_reviews.text: The back up function is flawless and done automatically; all good. But It'd be more handy if there is better COPY function. I meant I have to manually look for what folder to select, copy, and then look for the iDisk to paste the copied photos. I thought when I have this device, all I'll have to do is to click on the copy button, then the application would popup what folders to copy, then select whichever folder I want...and bambam. My Mom definitely can't use this so-called auto photo stick. And I'm a Samsung guy!
customer_reviews.author: amazomie

customer_reviews.title: Easy as pie!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased another external storage before for my iPhone (because I take entirely too many photos!!!) and it was no where close to as easy and clear as this one is!!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: 312JK630

customer_reviews.title: idiskk did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I could not get past installation as what I was following did not match what was on app.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia G. Cullivan

customer_reviews.title: Unusable on iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: This flash drive running their iDiskk Max app, will not display in landscape (horizontal) mode. That makes it useless on my iPad Pro. I tried going through their customer service for help. After twice sending emails saying I wasn't using it right, they finally sent this: Dear friend, Sorry, we will resolve this issue recently, if you could not wait for new app of it, please contact the sales of it to arrange returning it back. So, there you are. I returned the iDiskk.
customer_reviews.author: george s roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the right equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I was really sad. I plugged into my phone was able to transfer video very quick and easy however it would not take any photos. I was bummed I read the review and it said it would work with the iphone6. I could not get it to work for me. It could be I did something wrong not sure just sent it back and will go to the Apple Store. Apple Store for dummies.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Great customer support. Flash drive stopped working with lightning plug and I contacted customer company. They replaced defective drive with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: norm

customer_reviews.title: Stuck in my device.!!!
customer_reviews.text: The iDisk got stuck in my device and would not come out. Had to send it off for repair to be removed. I inserted correctly. It just would not come out if my computer. It will cost me 3 times the cost of the disk to get my computer repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Okeke

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, even for a 70 year old. I had a large cache of photos that weren’t directly family related that I wanted to keep but not consume space on my ipad and phone.
customer_reviews.author: spj

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The app did not work! I should have trusted the reviews. I am not giving China access to my phone!!!! I would not select a star but I have to submit this rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ALL TALK, VERY LITTLE ACTION HELP HRLP HELP
customer_reviews.text: Happy to receive it. However, not so easy to use. Instructions are colorful but minimal and unclear to someone not well versed in electronics. Where’s my question “do you want to find all of the pictures on your iPhone?” or “do you want to move all of your pictures to the device”. Why is operation not this simple? I can only find the copy commend so far and I am frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iOS 14.0.1 update Does't allow iDisk access to iOS system
customer_reviews.text: iDisk 128 GB worked with iOS 14! iOS update 14.0.1 prevent iDisk from working iDisk devlopers need to make iDisk more stable Deleted and reinstalled the iDisk app, didn't fix issue Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Red Frog

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a way to simply take pictures off my Windows 10 System and put them on an Apple iPad.
customer_reviews.author: lamplighter30

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This was a joke. It pretended to transfer files but it didn't. Instead it copied only a handful of old photos and then crashed repeatedly when trying to transfer the files to my computer. What a waste of my time AND money. I'll be refunded but save yourself the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you want all your phots scrambled like a deck of cards and once on your PC half are missing.
customer_reviews.text: I downloaded Idiskk max app then inserted drive into iphone 11 pro. It took three seperate downloads to get a message that all was completed. Put drive into usb on windows 10 PC and downloaded to the drive I wanted, but when finished half of the photo files would not open. Looking at photos on phone now all are shuffled out of order and or missing. This is criminal what has happened to my photos.
customer_reviews.author: TX

customer_reviews.title: the best option to make a backup of an iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ítem !!️ Plug & Play and easy to use The app is excellent The best option to make a backup of an iPhone X Max or any iPhone
customer_reviews.author: CATALINA BURGUETE ALBUERNE

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy from this buy. This product does not work and he didn’t refund my money after I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Cam

customer_reviews.title: Great for transferring pictures to your laptop if you don't use a Mac computer
customer_reviews.text: Since I do not use a Mac computer, its not very easy to move my pictures from my IPhone or IPad to my laptop. I prefer to do that rather than paying Apple to store them in ICloud for a monthly fee, and it makes it much easier for me to order prints of the pictures I want, and to organize them. This product works great in moving pictures and film from the device to the flash drive, then transferring those items to my laptop. Only issue is that it is a bit expensive for a flash drive with a little bit of software on it, but I'm still happy I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This drive worked well to download over 10,000 photos off an iPhone XR. Only took a couple of minutes vs a full day using iTunes and a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, reading reviews and watching videos, I purchased the iDiskk USB 3.0 for my mom to download her photos/videos off her iphone 7. She is not very techy. She was very pleased that it was not difficult to use. Just download the free app., follow instructions in booklet and transfer to computer. By using the IDiskk to transfer photos to the computer, it saves space on her iphone and she does not need to buy more cloud space. EIther use the iDiskk to use as external storage, or to copy or move photos from iphone to computer. Yes. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Collector

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: After I realized it downloads also through our internet, and many other clients reviews , I am convinced this product is NOT SAFE. Too many information, too fast will slip off your Control. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Otter Box
customer_reviews.text: In theory, great idea. But what is the point of it when it doesn't work with all kinds of cases? Is it really difficult to design the iPhone receptor a bit longer so that it will work with all cases? I have a long commute and transfer a lot of video files so that I can watch on my commute. I am not going to take my phone in an out of my Otter Box every day so that I can watch videos.
customer_reviews.author: WDC5440

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Loss of time, money and Information - I would NOT buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have owned. Both stopped working. This one lasted almost 6 weeks. Garbage. And even worse, I cannot recover the information inside and it is confidential because of my business. It stopped working before I could pull data off it. I would NOT recommend this product EVER. Not only frustrating, lost the purchasing amount, but 5 moths of my information is locked inside. I would NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my phone, which is an I-phone 6. It does not work for my phone and so it did NOT live up to what it said it would do. Now, I have to wait until I get new I-phones to use it if I do not lose it before then, It was a waste of my money and it will not work at all on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. B

customer_reviews.title: Total failure after only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I put all my personal photos on this drive and now it says it’s “not connected “ when it is. How is this product Apple certified? They need to get the application fixed, or this drive is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed great at first, easy to use and effective. After loading videos and pictures on night one, I attempted to use it the next morning and it was completely locked up. Tried to erase info, add and also reformat the drive, nothing works. I can still see my data but no ability to use the drive. Reached out to the rep listed in reviews a few days ago and haven’t heard anything. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JK002

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, I wanted for a six week vacation as a way to save an organize my pictures that my husband and I took using our phones. I was able to make folders for each city and transfer the pics at the end of the day to the appropriate folder. When we got home I transferred them to my computer, and was able to make my photo book.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for less than two months Now usb cant be detected by both my iphones 6plus and XSmax Update 8/16/19: 2stars. seller responded fast and willing to replace with the 12 months warranty. Will see how this will turn out.
customer_reviews.author: terence

customer_reviews.title: It’s a perfect blend of USB and Fire Wire
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this product is that I get a “fire wire” fit as well as a USB fit. So, I can use on my iPhone as well as on a desktop or laptop computer. I purchased this specifically so that I can offload some storage from my iPhone or iPad and transfer it to someone who has a PC and uses a USB port to transfer things. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Curnutt

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about it. Works great. Faster than the knock off I had before. Easy to use for the most part. Takes a little to figure out sometimes how to paste files. Really, the only complaint I have is that there’s no way to print the PDFs from the app or flash drive unless I’m just missing something.
customer_reviews.author: patrick baker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This item didn’t work at all. The app wouldn’t stay open on iPhone or load any pictures. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: kkdmnurse

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to transfer pictures off of my phone during a vacation (I didn’t want to bring my nice camera, so I was using only my phone). It worked like a dream! I set it up to automatically download my new pics, and now that I’m home, it works just like a thumb drive. I am really pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: SWegmann

customer_reviews.title: I loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this USB drive. Its easy to use. And it's apple certified. It's sturdy metal design and can be hung using a lanyard or paracord. I will recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V. Morgan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Transfered all videos and photos from ipad to iDiskk but when I try to view the contents of the iDiskk on my computer I get an error message. Not worth the time it took to transfer! Wish I could return but I've discarded all my packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It claimed the downloaded files could be read on android devices and in my instance it couldn’t. Additionally it kept asking for permission to communicate with some Chinese companies server. Very suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Judkins

customer_reviews.title: Won't work for files
customer_reviews.text: You can save pictures - I guess. That's not why I bought it. I wanted to save files created mostly by me. Pdf's, Word, Pages, Excel. If I jump through the hoops - save the file to the app, then copy to the iDiskk - seems like it should go but it never does. So Item is pretty useless for me. Perhaps it is my 5s phone?
customer_reviews.author: Marhkco

customer_reviews.title: Easy, even for a novice
customer_reviews.text: I am not very computer savvy. My iPhone had 3000 photos & was getting slow. This flash drive uploaded my photos & down loaded them on my computer so easily, without me doing anything. I didn’t erase the photos from my phone, until I knew they were on the computer. I think I could have done it with the flash drive. I wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: JANICE

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get more storage space for photos . This copied all my photos to the disk but not as simple as it says. I wasn’t sure how to do it. I could not choose which items i wanted to copy and which I wanted to leave on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Flash Drive- Formatting Error
customer_reviews.text: Received the attached notification when trying to use the iDiskk 128G flash drive. Tried to format the flash drive on my PC but I continue to get the notification despite being formatted. And because I waited so long to use the flash drive I discovered the problem too late and missed my window to return this product. Extremely disappointing
customer_reviews.author: North Phx Mom!

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!  Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this! Do my work on my Windows 10 laptop; copy tons of excel & word docs, pics, etc. onto this; plug into my ipad or iphone & get instant access to it all! No need to lug my 17" laptop around; so it's now replaced with a 3-in-1 desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: works once you load the app
customer_reviews.text: couldn't get it to work, but with customer service chat, I realized I needed to download idiskk Max app. With the app, it works great & very fast. the directions that come with the devise could be better written.
customer_reviews.author: karter

customer_reviews.title: unreliable  good for awhile then not even a good paper weight
customer_reviews.text: I brought a 256k for myself and will admit I loved it.. So much so I brought another 256k for my Granddaughter... But that was 6 months ago... well now both mine and my granddaughter's have just died... plug one in and nothing happens... Used to plug one in and get the "ALLOW or Not Allow" tap allow and all is well. but now absolutely nothing happens. open the iDiskk app and all it says is iDiskk not found... Never again
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! GREAT PRODUCT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Spent an entire day trying to load the pictures from my phone onto my computer to transfer to a thumb drive. Was having sooo much trouble. I decided to give this product a try. It is worth every penny!!!! Transferred hundreds of pictures in about 2 minutes. Let me arrange them and they are all on the drive. Checked it on the computer to make sure they were on there and sure enough, they are. Well worth the money. Couldn’t be happier. Just wish it had a cover for both ends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: No idea why anyone is complaining about this device. It is FANTASTIC! I highly recommend this for transferring photos/videos from your iPhone to a PC. Works better than I could have hoped.
customer_reviews.author: RobbieAtlanta

customer_reviews.title: Good product, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product, working with my iPhone perfectly. Because iPhone is very sensitive for the device connected to it, so I think spend a little extra money is worth. I bought a cheap one before, not only inconvenience but also gives me very poor quality when it transferred pictures from my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Yi Zhang

customer_reviews.title: No music
customer_reviews.text: Will store no music files. I realize that prior to 2017 most music was copy protected but that has changed. Purchased just for music files to play back in car. Was on the road for a month so too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: mtree

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: This oroduct is very easy to use. I have over 7000 pictures that I was able to store on this device from my iphone. Once on the device, easy to transfer to a computer. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels95

customer_reviews.title: ONLY for iPads and IPhones. Not MAC computers! Sending back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after having searched through Amazon for photos storage devices. This one popped up as a likely option. I wanted to store pictures from my Macintosh computer onto a large capacity flash drive. This product DOES NOTsupport Macintosh computers. It ONLY. supports iPads and iPhones. Do NOT Buy this product if you want to download pictures from your Macintosh computer.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley S. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Important backup
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have photos backed up. They are only little once. Don’t loose the memories. Besides they love looking at themselves when I print photos of them from the past- not way past, just their past:-)
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Plays everything!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the ixpand. This drive plays everything, avi, mkv, mp4, mpg, .... You just have to download the app for the phone and then it is plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with the case on my i phone The depth of the connection port will not allow the usb to connect I purchased this because it stated it has a longer connection plug???
customer_reviews.author: JKBL McGuinness

customer_reviews.title: Research this product thoroughly before buying.
customer_reviews.text: I am past the return window on this product. I just read the instructions and found that if you back up your photos in iCloud, the photos will not transfer to the iDiskk. Since virtually everyone does this this transfer system is worthless. Very disappointed in what I assumed would be a simple process.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey G. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Downloaded the app and once you plug it in it’s a breeze to use. Easy to copy photos to it or even from it. You can create folders to keep everything organized. I carry it with me so I have constant access to the photos on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible photo stick more than half my pictures that were downloaded on the photo stick from my phone do not appear when I try to view on my computer I do not recommend this photo stick. I wanted to save my photos on a good photo stick so I could delete them from my phone not an option with this one
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as an MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Makes a GREAT MP3 player when you use the supplied app and play your files from the "Files/Folders" option rather than the built-in Music function. In fact, I've owned a lot of portable MP3 players over the years, and using an iPhone with this device (i.e. touch screen, AirPods, BlueTooth that really works, etc.) makes it the very best MP3 player I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Craig2019

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: My iphone was running low on storage, and as you know icloud it not always easy to configure. So this flash drive saved me lots of time and now my iphon's photos are saved on another cloud. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great
customer_reviews.text: The device fails to transfer more than 75% of the time. I took two hours to transfer a handful of 200meg files bc it would quit halfway through. The IDiskk Max application has no way to sort by filename once the files are stored in the app. You can only sort on the physical device but since it overheats quickly that isn’t helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: Great capacity but a bit pricy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use bought them for my daughter for a birthday present price seems a bit high but if it does the job and has great capacity then I guess it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jack Price

customer_reviews.title: Photo Keeper
customer_reviews.text: If you have dozens of photos in your phone, this is for you. I saved them all in a matter of minutes and stored them in a hard drive. Now I won’t loose any of them and my phone e has more space
customer_reviews.author: Migdalia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Always disconnected
customer_reviews.text: I can’t upload it cause always disconnected.I purchase this April but I was so busy so I don’t have time to use it.I try to use it and there is always problem with the top section kind a loose thats why it’s always say disconnected when I try to upload anything.You guys need to send me another one to replace this there is a warranty
customer_reviews.author: muzaffer kucuk

customer_reviews.title: iDiskk USB 3.0 128GB Flash Drive
customer_reviews.text: The worst product I ever had. I made videos on my Sony DSC RX-10 M4 and copied the video files MP4 to my iMac. I was able to copy to the iDiskk USB 3.0 128GB Flash Drive, but when I plug in to my iPhone 11 Pro Max I am not able to see the video file to copy it to my iPhone. I am frustrated and I am not recommending to anyone spending money on this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bela Pecsi

customer_reviews.title: No Flash in the Pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkable USB Flash that fits on my iPhone, iPad and travel 13" Mac with all the files I need on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Lagler

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I need to upgrade my computer but wanted to get the picture backed up on a drive just encase something happened to my phone. This was so easy to use. Just download the app, plug this in, and hit a button within the app. Everything was transferred in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Z.

customer_reviews.title: Photo Rescue
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to use with instructions. You do need to download an app to use it though. It did exactly what we needed! Pricing is high for what it is in my opinion but....
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product - easy to use for instant downloads!!!
customer_reviews.text: Truly Plug and Play! I simply plugged the iDiskk into my iPhone 7 (after removing the Otter Case, which was blocking it from fully plugging in), I received a prompt o download the corresponding app from the AppStore, then it downloaded all the pictures and video from my phone! I suggest that you start the download when your phone is fully charged though, otherwise you may need to do it in two phases. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven E

product_meta.title: iDiskk 128GB USB Flash Drive Photo Stick for iPhone 11 Pro XR X XS MAX iPhone 6/7/8 Plus and ipad Air/Mini,New ipad pro,External Storage for iOS System,Touch ID Encryption and MFI Certified (128GB)
feature_bullets: ✔【FAST FREE UP SPACE WITH 128GB EXTERNAL STOGRAE】-Just connect in the lightning Photo Stick, easily move photos, videos and other files off your iPhone or iPad and onto the flash drive, from the drive, you can also transfer these files into your Mac,PC or other devices.

✔【WATCH MOVIES DIRECTLY FROM THE PHOTO STICK】 -Connect and play,enjoy movies or musics stored in the flash drive when you are on trip or travel, most video formats are supported: (VIDEOS: AVI, M4V, MKV, MOV, MP4, MPG, RM, RMVB, TS, WMV, FLV, 3GP; AUDIOS:FLAC, APE, AAC, AIF, M4A, MP3, WAV)
✔【AUTOMATIC PHOTO or VEDIO BACKUP】 -Every time you connect the flash drive in, use "iDiskk Max" App camera to take photos/video ,which will be automatically stored into the flash drive.
✔【HIGH-SPEED TRANSFERS WITH USB 3.0】 -Mfi Certified flash drive guarantees fast and stable data transfers,one HD movies ( approx. 1GB) only needs about 20s.
✔【COMPATIBILITY & 12 MONTHS】 -iPhone 11 Pro,iPhone X, 5 5s 6 6+ 6s 6s+ se 7 7+; iPad (iOS 8.0 or higher), Computer OS Support Mac OS X v10.6+, Windows 7/8/10
